name: Struggles at Sea
description:
A (unfinished) prototype put together for the Weekly Game Jam #132 by 

CODER

Gen ( https://gmr.dev )

ARTIST

Cos (https://www.instagram.com/dragonpelt/)

COMPOSER/SOUND DESIGNER

Alex (www.alexandrejannuzzi.com)

==============================================================

Controls:
ARROW KEYS = FLY

Dive under the water to collect fish. Fly up to view more of the ocean. Press up repeatedly while facing up to struggle out of the water if you get stuck.
==============================================================

Unfinished, as some of our members had life get in the way.
